name: gr8artgames-Struggling Dreams
description:
Created for the Goethe Institut gr8artgames (Boston) game jam, 2017.

Use the mouse (click and hold) to help refugees remember and envision better and safer times, so they can gather the strength to move on and escape danger.

Credits:

Programming/art/design/QA - Jeff Campbell

Art/design/QA - Aslanta Chen

Sound effects guru - Joe Marchuk

Programming/art/design/QA - Dan Williams

View the rest of the games at http://goethe.de/artgames
